title: Why does the key have to be bruteforced in 32 bit chunks? Couldn't it be done bit by bit to speed things up?
author: dbalatoni13

comments.body:
If you knew what values to expect for each individual bit, you'd already have the key.
The four key registers are 32 bit long, and if you zero out 3/4 of them you need to test all 2<sup>32</sup> different bit combinations until matching output is produced.

title: please add build of button usb payload
author: ikyih
